name: Baldi's Basics Field Trip: Let's go to camping!
name_original: Baldi's Basics Field Trip: Let's go to camping!
description:
Baldi wants us to go camping, while he makes sure that the forest is safe from bears, the player will have to prevent the fire from going out by facing Baldi and different enemies. This was originally a withdrawn demo of the full Baldi's Basics game. It is practically Baldi's Basics in Education and Learning Field Trip: Camping but with some changes so that the game is not the same as the demo.

All rights to Basically Games.

2022
